hadiths.text: Fatima bint Qais (Allah be pleased with her) reported:My husband divorced me with three pronouncements. I decided to move (from his house to another place). So I came to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ), and he said: Move to the house of your cousin 'Amr b. Umm Maktum and spend your period of 'Idda there

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُطَلَّقَةُ ثَلاَثًا لاَ نَفَقَةَ لَهَا
chapter.eng-name: The woman who has been irrevocably divorced is not entitled to spending
